full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title and Reference Number
Wheel Assembly, Pneumatic Tire | Assemblage de roue, pneu à air comprimé
Reference Number: cb-7571-294514

## Solicitation Number and Amendment Number
Solicitation Number: W8485-247767/A, Amendment Number: 1

## Dates and Status
Publication Date: 2023-07-26, Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-23T14:00:00, Amendment Date: 2023-08-23
Tender Status: Expired

## Procurement Details
Procurement Category: Goods, Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
Note: As a result of the COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service instead of sending them directly to the bid receiving unit.

## Deliverables and Specifications
The Department of National Defence requires the following items to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal by the end of September 2023:

* Item 1: Wheel assembly, pneumatic tire, NSN: 2530-01-500-5054, Quantity: 50 units, Unit of Issue: EA (Individual)
	+ Part No.: 492-127, NCAGE: 94861

Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number, and the NCAGE they are offering.

## Selection Criteria and Evaluation
The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price, in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Contact Information and Documents
Contact Name: Dany Lebel, Email: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca, Phone: (000) 000-0000
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The attached documents include the bid solicitation and other relevant information.

[hyperlink to the attached documents]

Note: All information is up to date to the best of the technical writer's understanding from the original document shared by the contractors. Any misunderstanding or error is solely the writer's responsibility. No guarantee of correctness is provided.

Format compliant with standard government tender announcements in Canada. The rewriting does not add additional information to the existing document. The original text is included in the rewritten and rephrased version for comparison. Bits and pieces are rearranged for enhanced readability while keeping the original message intact.
